column4: Hey everyone, Ubuntu/Linux newbie here. I used Ubuntu for about 2 days and I formatted, leaving windows out of the equation. Now what? time to learn bash?
:)  I love Ubuntu, it IS easy to use. And looks great.
I just ordered a new 6 core machine, can't wait to see how it performs on Ubuntu
yeah learning about the command line and the things you can do from it is a good next step if your goal is to learn about Linux and Ubuntu.
